name: 蔡定江
objective: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
schedule:
1.	Introduction to Computer-Aided Engineering Analysis 
2.	Basic theory of solid mechanics and heat transfer
3.	Introduction to finite element method (FEM)
4.	Analysis of simple solid structure with Mathematica
5.	Analysis of axially loaded structures with FEM package
6.	Analysis of torsionally loaded structures with FEM package
7.	Analysis of beam structures with FEM package
8.	Analysis of frame structure with FEM package
9.	期中考
10.	Static analysis of a single machine part with FEM package
11.	Analysis of assembled machine parts with FEM package
12.	Analysis of assembled machine parts with FEM package
13.	Analysis of heat transfer with FEM package
14.	Thermal stress analysis with FEM package
15.	Dynamic analysis with FEM package
16.	Special topic for practical engineering application I
17.	Special topic for practical engineering application II
18.	期末考
scorePolicy:
學習態度與課堂表現 10%
作業與報告成績 30%
期中考 30%
期末考 30%
materials:
1.自編講義
2.Mechanics of Materials Labs w/ SolidWorks Simulation 2014,  Huei-Huang Lee 全華圖書

Ref.
1.材料力學課本
2.SolidWorks Simulation 原廠教育訓練手冊 實威科技股份有限公司 編著 易習圖書

修課同學注意事項:
0.本課程不適合乙班同學選修，乙班同學另有"電腦輔助工程分析與實習"之必修課程，學分數不同
1.材料力學不及格者，勿修
2.要會使用數學運算軟體(如Mathematica, Matlab等)編寫程式
3.會使用3D繪圖軟體(最好是SolidWorks)建構實體模型
